document.full_text: gunmen on motorcycles shot and killed a saudi diplomat in the pakistani city of karachi on monday, police and the saudi ambassador said, the second attack on the mission since the killing of osama bin laden increased tension in the region.
document.title: gunmen kill saudi diplomat in pakistan's karachi
lines_and_colors: gunmen on motorcycles shot and killed a saudi diplomat in the pakistani city of karachi on monday, police and the saudi ambassador said, the second attack on the mission since the killing of osama bin laden increased tension in the region.
